description:
T1 (tag: 0342) Mature Tree of Heaven - Prune to provide clearance from adjacent buildings by approx. 4m back to suitable growth points - Lift low hanging crown to approx. 6m all round
T3 (tag: 0344) London plane - Prune to provide crown front of William Harvey Heart Centre -clearance from adjacent buildings by approx. 4m - Lift low crown to an even level to approx. 6m above ground level and remove stem growth to 6m T4 (tag: 0134) 
T4 (tag: 0134) Mature London plane - Prune to provide upper crown clearance from adjacent buildings by approx. 4m
T5(tag: 0135) Mature London Plane- Remove any epicormic growth from main stem to 10m - Lift low hanging crown to approx. 10m (approx. height of roof railings) to an even level 
T6 (tag: 0338) Mature- London plane -Remove any epicormic growths from main stem to 10m - Lift low hanging crown to approx. 10m to an even level.
T7 (tag: 0136) Mature London plane on-Northern perimeter of Charterhouse Square 
Remove any epicormic growths from main stem to 10m - Lift low hanging crown to approx. 10m 
T8 (tag: 0137) Mature London plane  
Remove any epicormic growths from main stem Lift low hanging crown to approx. 10m 
T9 (tag: 0341) Mature London plane Remove any epicormic growth from main stem to 10m Lift low hanging crown to approx. 10m (approx. height of roof railings) Removal of 1x large diameter scaffold branch @7m (west) 
Please note all above trees will also have deadwood removed.
